titleStmt.title: Cornu-copia, or, Roome for a ram-head wherein is described the dignity of the ram-head above the round-head or rattle-head.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Taylor by Wing, Charles A. Stonehill, Jr.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
